title: Strengthening Medical Practice Competencies: Information Literacy-Based Practical Competency Assessment Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic information retrieval and practical experience in social sciences
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Critically analyze information sources in real-world work scenarios to evaluate their credibility
Apply information literacy throughout the entire process, from social data collection to report writing
Complete an information utilization project incorporating peer feedback and present the results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
